title: We're unable to log you in because you may be offline
body: Is there really more to say? It will not allow me to log in whether I do what they say on the Known Issue Thread or if I repair my client. This is clearly a problem affecting more and more people

replies.body:
found by C9 HlGH ty mate you helped a lot

Go to C:\Windows\System32\drivers\etc and open the file "hosts" in notepad Then delete
"23.74.24.114 l3cdn.riotgames.com" from the bottom.

tell everyone who got issues help others while riot cant do shit
i don't have that line, i followed to steps and that line doesn't exist for me.
Me tooo i can't find the line
the thing to delete doesn't show up for me in the hosts file. What do I do?
I cannot find this line on hosts folder. Ffs..
It works!!  thank you so much!!
it won't let me save?
Same here, and even when I run as Admin, the host file won't  show up when I search under etc in drivers. Very frustrating.
Try this take that file out of the etc folder and put that somewhere else now edit that and save it put it back to the etc folder
GOD BLESS YOU
Works like a charm, thanks {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
for me running LeagueClient.exe as administrator helped

We're currently looking into what happened with the login servers overnight and it seems like everything is back to normal at this point. Please let me know if you still can't get logged in so I can help troubleshoot!
I can't login sir .
it still says it's not connected to http servers and when I try to log in it says I'm offline, when my connection is perfectly fine
i still can't login. i've tried everything
same

I actually tried to reinstall and now I'm having an https server connection everytime I try to enter the client. I've tried everything from changing my dns server address to restarting my computer, none of it seems to work. I've submitted a request and I've been waiting for almost 12 hours now. which is ridiculous. I wanted to complete my missions for the day but it seems I won't be able to do that
I tried to delete that line out of the hosts file and it doesn't show up for me in the file.  I'm unable to log into the game at this point.  The option to even enter my password is greyed out.
Mine has done the same, just now. I am Uninstalling and reinstalling to see if that works

I tried this last night, the problem i had was that when i tried to start my client update it would have a RADS error and not update at all. had to copy from my laptop to my PC to get it to even start again, then had to do this fix, works great now.
please update.
It does not. I tried an hour ago =(
i dont think itll work problem is with client as long as they dont deploy patch nothing will change and with that offline client idk how they gonna patch it
Same for me. What happened my League of Legends. I don't understand. I don't wanna see problems on league. PLease fix it now.You low developers
